pages.text: Miniature Bull Terriers were originally bred for ratting and pit-fighting, though they make excellent family dogs.$(br2)Standing at roughly half a block tall, these stocky dogs come in five different coats.
Example of a Miniature Bull Terrier
Miniature Bull Terriers are found most commonly in various windswept biomes, including windswept savannas. You can also find them in other savannas and, more rarely, old growth birch forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken or Rabbit Treat.
